post.description: Creates a new user account with member role
Authenticates a user and returns access token
Logs out the authenticated user by revoking the current token

get.description: Returns the profile of the authenticated user

put.description: Updates the profile of the authenticated user
Changes the password of the authenticated user

post.description: Sends a password reset link to the user's email

message.example: Password reset link sent to your email

post.description: Resets the user's password using the reset token

get.description: Returns basic information about the API
Returns the health status of the API
Returns a paginated list of all members with search and filtering capabilities

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for name, email, or phone

post.description: Creates a new member with the member role

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific member

put.description: Updates the information of a specific member

delete.description: Permanently deletes a member from the system
